__TOC__



The following outlines the changes between the Lucid and Maverick kernel configs for each of the archs and flavors.  It should be noted that in the Maverick kernel, support for i386-386, amd64-preempt, lpia, ia64, and sparc were decommissioned and are therefor not reflected in this review.

Complete config files for each flavor and arch can be found at http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~kernel-ppa/configs/
